sn56.1:1.6: ‘Idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
sn56.1:2.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yogo karaniyo, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yogo karaniyo, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
